name: Mermaid Valentine Day DressUp
description:
After a long day of swimming through her favorite coral reef, this gorgeous mermaid is feeling exhausted.
Follow the instructions to apply various beauty treatments like a soothing seaweed mask and calming back massage. Once she's feeling refreshed, browse the wide selection of girly hairstyles, oceanic accessories, fashionable clothes and more, to create the perfect look for her hot date in this fun online spa game for girls!
